name: Midnight Madness Quiz | Midnight Madness | 10 Questions

questions.text: What color team was Blaylak on?
questions.explanation:
Green.

	Blaylak was played by Dirk Blocker.  His father was Dan Blocker, Hoss, of "Bonanza" fame.

questions.text: What is the name of the apartment building that Leon lives in?
questions.explanation:
Hollywood Tower.

	When Adam is walking up to the building to meet the mysterious person who sent him a letter you can see the sign for Hollywood Tower.

questions.text: What time are the teams supposed to meet to start the games?

questions.explanation:
Lucille.

	Lucille doesn't want Harold to off of his diet.

questions.text: Which teams have the least amount of players?
questions.explanation:
White & Red.

	Both the white and the red teams only have 4 players.  The yellow team starts out with 4 but ends up with Adam's brother Scott to make 5.

Bonaventure Hotel.

	"The finish line is somewhere in the Bonaventure Hotel."--Leon

Yellow.

	It actually came down to the Yellow and Blue teams.  But the yellow team was the first one to make it into the room.

questions.text: During the golf game at Miniature Gold World, which hole was the clue found on?
questions.explanation:
14.

	The Blue team tried to cheat and go to the end and had to go back and play from the beginning.  The green team is the first team to find the clue at this location.

questions.text: What was on the waitress's necklace at Johnny's Fat Boy Burger?
questions.explanation:
Hug Me.

	It was scrambled and made the phrase Huge M which led them to Miniature Golf World.

questions.text: This movie almost had what other name for its title?
questions.explanation:
The Great Allnighter.

	You can find this information on the back cover of the DVD version.
